com.acmerobotics.roadrunner.localization

Interface Localizer

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MecanumDrive.MecanumLocalizer, SwerveDrive.SwerveLocalizer, TankDrive.TankLocalizer, ThreeTrackingWheelLocalizer, TwoTrackingWheelLocalizer

    public Localizer

    Generic interface for estimating robot pose over time.
